net.openhft.chronicle.bytes

Interface RandomDataOutput<R extends RandomDataOutput<R>>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bytes<Underlying>, BytesStore<B,Underlying>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBytes, AbstractBytesStore, ChunkedMappedBytes, CommonMappedBytes, EnbeddedBytes, GuardedNativeBytes, HeapBytesStore, HexDumpBytes, MappedBytes, MappedBytesStore, NativeBytes, NativeBytes.NativeSubBytes, NativeBytesStore, NoBytesStore, OnHeapBytes, PointerBytesStore, SingleMappedBytes, SubBytes, UncheckedBytes, UncheckedNativeBytes, VanillaBytes

    public interface RandomDataOutput<R extends RandomDataOutput<R>>

      default long writeUtf8Limited(long offset, @Nullable CharSequence cs, int maxUtf8Len)
      Writes the given cs to this RandomDataOutput from the given offset, in Utf8 format, checking that the utf8 encoding size of the given char sequence is less or equal to the given maxUtf8Len, otherwise IllegalArgumentException is thrown, and no bytes of this RandomDataOutput are overwritten.

      • writeUtf8

        default long writeUtf8(long offset,
                       @Nullable
                       @Nullable CharSequence cs)
                throws BufferOverflowException,
                       IllegalStateException,
                       ArithmeticException
        Writes the given cs to this RandomDataOutput from the given offset, in Utf8 format. Returns the offset after the written char sequence.
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset to write char sequence from
        cs - the char sequence to write, could be null
        Returns:
        the offset after the char sequence written, in this RandomDataOutput
        Throws:
        BufferOverflowException
        IllegalStateException
        ArithmeticException
        See Also:
        RandomDataInput.readUtf8(long, Appendable)

      • writeUtf8Limited

        default long writeUtf8Limited(long offset,
                              @Nullable
                              @Nullable CharSequence cs,
                              int maxUtf8Len)
                       throws BufferOverflowException,
                              IllegalStateException,
                              ArithmeticException
        Writes the given cs to this RandomDataOutput from the given offset, in Utf8 format, checking that the utf8 encoding size of the given char sequence is less or equal to the given maxUtf8Len, otherwise IllegalArgumentException is thrown, and no bytes of this RandomDataOutput are overwritten. Returns the offset after the written char sequence.
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset to write char sequence from
        cs - the char sequence to write, could be null
        maxUtf8Len - the maximum allowed length (in Utf8 encoding) of the given char sequence
        Returns:
        the offset after the char sequence written, in this RandomDataOutput
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given char sequence size in Utf8 encoding exceeds maxUtf8Len
        BufferOverflowException
        IllegalStateException
        ArithmeticException
        See Also:
        RandomDataInput.readUtf8Limited(long, Appendable, int), RandomDataInput.readUtf8Limited(long, int)

      • write8bit

        long write8bit(long position,
               BytesStore bs)
        Write the stop bit length and copy the BytesStore
        Parameters:
        position - to write
        bs - to copy.
        Returns:
        the offset after the char sequence written, in this RandomDataOutput

        Returns:

        the highest limit allowed for this buffer.

        default long realCapacity()
        Returns:
        the limit for this buffer without resizing

      • readPosition

        default long readPosition()
        The read position must be start() <= readPosition() && readPosition() <= readLimit() && readPosition < safeLimit()
        Returns:
        position to read from.

      • writePosition

        default long writePosition()
        The write position must be readPosition() <= writePosition() && writePosition() <= writeLimit()
        Returns:
        position to write to.

      • readRemaining

        default long readRemaining()
        Returns:
        How many more bytes can we read.

      • realReadRemaining

        default long realReadRemaining()
        Returns:
        how much can be safely read directly.

      • writeRemaining

        default long writeRemaining()
        Returns:
        How many more bytes can we written.

      • realWriteRemaining

        default long realWriteRemaining()
        Returns:
        writeRemaining with resize

      • readLimit

        default long readLimit()
        Returns:
        the highest offset or position allowed for this buffer.

      • writeLimit

        default long writeLimit()

      • addressForRead

        long addressForRead(long offset)
             throws UnsupportedOperationException,
                    BufferUnderflowException,
                    IllegalStateException
        Obtain the underlying addressForRead. This is for expert users only.
        Parameters:
        offset - within this buffer. addressForRead(start()) is the actual addressForRead of the first byte.
        Returns:
        the underlying addressForRead of the buffer
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the underlying buffer is on the heap
        BufferUnderflowException - if the offset is before the start() or the after the capacity()
        IllegalStateException
